section.title: Attaching an Existing Data Domain to a Data Center
section.para: Data domains that are Unattached can be attached to a data center. Shared storage domains of multiple types (iSCSI, NFS, FC, POSIX, and Gluster) can be added to the same data center.

procedure.title: Attaching an Existing Data Domain to a Data Center

step.para: Click the Data Centers resource tab and select the appropriate data center.
Select the Storage tab in the details pane to list the storage domains already attached to the data center.
Click Attach Data to open the Attach Storage window.
Select the check box for the data domain to attach to the data center. You can select multiple check boxes to attach multiple data domains.

section.para: The data domain is attached to the data center and is automatically activated.
